title: eBay : gross merchandise volume 2014 to 2019
yAxis: Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 23 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Quarter Q4 '18 and lowest at Quarter Q3 '15.
The lowest value at Quarter Q3 '15 is 1.26x times less than the highest value at Q4 '18.

max_summary: This bar chart has 23 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Quarter Q4 '18 and lowest at Quarter Q3 '15.

Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars at Quarter Q4 '18 is 24.64 , second place is Q4 '17 at 24.43, and thirdly is Q2 '18 at 23.63.
Overall Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars has decreased over the Quarters.
The Quarter Q3 '15 has 1.13 times less Gross merchandise volume in billion U.S. dollars than average.
